meanings.sent1: The feu was passed down through generations in the noble family.
meanings.sent2: The king granted the feu to the loyal knight for his service.
meanings.sent3: The feu seemed to have a mind of its own, always bringing luck to its owners.
meanings.sent4: The feu stood tall and proud, a symbol of power and heritage.
meanings.sent5: The feu shimmered in the sunlight, a beacon of history and tradition.

meanings.definition: A right to the use of land.
meanings.sent1: She inherited the feu and could now cultivate the fertile soil.
meanings.sent2: The villagers shared the feu for grazing their livestock.
meanings.sent3: The feu whispered secrets of the land to those who listened closely.
meanings.sent4: His claim to the feu was as solid as the roots of the ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: The feu embraced the farmers, offering sustenance and shelter.
